sections.heading: Fees; refusal to pay; when justified
sections.text: It shall be lawful for any person to refuse payment of fees to any officer who will not make out a fee bill signed by him if required, and also a receipt or discharge signed by him for fees paid.SourceR.S.1866, c. 19, ยง 28, p. 171;R.S.1913, ยง 2471;C.S.1922, ยง 241
